pkgmetadata.longdescription: COSCMD#######################.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/coscmd.svg :target: https://pypi.org/search/?q=coscmd :alt: Pypi.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/tencentyun/coscmd.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/tencentyun/coscmd :alt: Travis CI 介绍_______腾讯云COS命令行工具, 目前可以支持Python2.6与Python2.7以及Python3.x。安装指南__________使用pip安装 :: pip install -U coscmd手动安装:: python setup.py install使用方法__________使用coscmd，参照 https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/436/10976
